Michel DeBauge is a Seattle-based graphic designer with an interest in interactive digital media, user experience, and visual identity design.

A grad of SCCA, he has been a musician in the band, Western Haunts, and before that, graduated from UW with degrees in Psychology and Communication. Recently, he's worked at SAP - Concur as a design intern and also volunteers at ChickTech, teaching web design to high school students.

For full-time or freelance inquiries: micheldebauge@gmail.com
